attributes.review: I opened the app and it almost gave me a heart attack, I saw a horrible orange chetto staring back at me I had to delete the app immediately. My eyes will never be the same...

attributes.review: This app is absolutely awful. I downloaded to see what all the hype was about and right as I opened it it called me ugly. And made me cry so I left the app. All I have to say is no. Also Stan BTS
